title: BIT - Basic Income Token
description:
**Users** in Atala are on-boarded by DID-Providers, lack **incentive** to explore the Cardano **ecosystem**.

Providers lack incentive to cooperate.
solution: Incentivise **users** to join the platform by a **guaranteed** virtual **income**, and DID-providers to **cooperate** in providing a unique online identity.
